home.title: Smiling Cups
home.subtitle: The digital platform that connects coffee lovers with the fun of probability.

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are a startup that connects coffee lovers with local coffee shops through a digital platform offering mystery boxes with subscriptions.

goals.title: Goals
goals.description: Our goals at Smiling Cups are:
goals.item2: Allowing users to share the projects and work in which they participated.
goals.item3: Helping small developers get involved in new projects.
